main event: On 21 July 1952, seven light objects were observed maneuvering in the sky over Rapid City, South Dakota.
interesting points: The objects were described as bright, round, and very fast moving,The sighting lasted from 1:00 a.m. to 2:30 a.m.,The objects appeared to be flying at an altitude of about 10,000 feet,It is estimated that the objects covered distances of about 30-40 miles in about 10-15 seconds,There were three witnesses to the event.
sighted object: seven light objects in the sky
